mapper.sql: ID, DESIGNERS, REFERENCE_WAVE, REFERENCE_PRINTING, CRAFTS_ORDER, PATTERN_CRAFTS_ORDER, SIZE_CHART, ORINGINAL_WAVE, WAVE, IMAGE, ORDERS, ORDER_DETAILS, COLOUR, RELEASE_TIME, PIECES_APPROVED, FOLWER_FACTORY, PROOFING_TIME, PROOFING_COMPLETION_TIME, LARGE_CARGO_TIME, LARGE_CARGO_COMPLETION_TIME, CUT_LARGE_RECEIVE_TIME, CUT_LARGE_RETURN_TIME, QUOT, PRINTING_PRICE, PIECES_PRICE, FLOWER_PRICE, ACCESSORIES_PURCHASING_TIME, FABRIC_STORAGE_TIME, FABRIC_RELEASE_TIME, CUTTING_TIME, CROP_COMPLETION_TIME, CROP_NUMBER, FACTORY_PICKING_TIME, FACTORY, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_PRICE, PLANNED_SHIPPING_TIME, STORAGE_TIME, STORAGE_NUMBER, REMARKS, STATE, ADD_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, DEL_TIME,urgent_state,patternCompletionTime,productCode,PLATEMAKING_TIME,PLAN_FACTORY_PICKING_TIME
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM build_progress WHERE STATE = '1' AND WAVE=#{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT SUM(ORDERS) as sumOrderNumber FROM build_progress where STATE = '1' AND 1=1
AND ORDER_TYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (ORDER_TYPE='' OR ORDER_TYPE IS NULL)
AND ORDER_TYPE !=''
AND CUT_LARGE_RECEIVE_TIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{cutLargeReceiveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (CUT_LARGE_RECEIVE_TIME='' OR CUT_LARGE_RECEIVE_TIME IS NULL)
AND CUT_LARGE_RECEIVE_TIME !=''
AND PLANNED_SHIPPING_TIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{plannedShippingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (PLANNED_SHIPPING_TIME='' OR PLANNED_SHIPPING_TIME IS NULL)
AND PLANNED_SHIPPING_TIME !=''
AND CUT_LARGE_RETURN_TIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{cutLargeReceiveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (CUT_LARGE_RETURN_TIME='' OR CUT_LARGE_RETURN_TIME IS NULL)
AND CUT_LARGE_RETURN_TIME !=''
AND FABRIC_STORAGE_TIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{fabricStorageTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (FABRIC_STORAGE_TIME='' OR FABRIC_STORAGE_TIME IS NULL)
AND FABRIC_STORAGE_TIME !=''
AND FABRIC_RELEASE_TIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{fabricStorageTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (FABRIC_RELEASE_TIME='' OR FABRIC_RELEASE_TIME IS NULL)
AND FABRIC_RELEASE_TIME !=''
AND DESIGNERS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{designers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (DESIGNERS='' OR DESIGNERS IS NULL)
AND DESIGNERS !=''
AND WAVE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND WAVE ='' OR WAVE IS NULL
AND WAVE !=''
AND RELEASE_TIME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{releaseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (RELEASE_TIME ='' OR RELEASE_TIME IS NULL)
AND RELEASE_TIME !=''
AND PIECES_APPROVED LIKE CONCAT('%',#{piecesApproved,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (PIECES_APPROVED ='' OR PIECES_APPROVED IS NULL)
AND PIECES_APPROVED !=''
AND FOLWER_FACTORY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{folwerFactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (FOLWER_FACTORY ='' OR FOLWER_FACTORY IS NULL)
AND FOLWER_FACTORY !=''
AND PROOFING_TIME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{proofingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (PROOFING_TIME ='' OR PROOFING_TIME IS NULL)
AND PROOFING_TIME !=''

AND LARGE_CARGO_TIME !=''

AND LARGE_CARGO_COMPLETION_TIME !=''

AND ACCESSORIES_PURCHASING_TIME !=''

AND (CUTTING_TIME ='' OR CUTTING_TIME IS NULL)
AND CUTTING_TIME !=''

AND (CROP_COMPLETION_TIME ='' OR CROP_COMPLETION_TIME IS NULL)
AND CROP_COMPLETION_TIME !=''

AND (CROP_NUMBER ='' OR CROP_NUMBER IS NULL)
AND CROP_NUMBER !=''

AND (FACTORY_PICKING_TIME ='' OR FACTORY_PICKING_TIME IS NULL)
AND FACTORY_PICKING_TIME !=''
AND FACTORY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (FACTORY ='' OR FACTORY IS NULL)
AND FACTORY !=''
AND STORAGE_TIME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storageTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (STORAGE_TIME ='' OR STORAGE_TIME IS NULL)
AND STORAGE_TIME !=''

AND ORDER_TYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')

AND CUT_LARGE_RECEIVE_TIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{cutLargeReceiveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (CUT_LARGE_RECEIVE_TIME='' OR CUT_LARGE_RECEIVE_TIME IS NULL)

AND (PLANNED_SHIPPING_TIME='' OR PLANNED_SHIPPING_TIME IS NULL)
AND PLANNED_SHIPPING_TIME !=''

AND (CUT_LARGE_RETURN_TIME='' OR CUT_LARGE_RETURN_TIME IS NULL)
AND CUT_LARGE_RETURN_TIME !=''

AND (FABRIC_STORAGE_TIME='' OR FABRIC_STORAGE_TIME IS NULL)
AND FABRIC_STORAGE_TIME !=''

AND (DESIGNERS='' OR DESIGNERS IS NULL)

AND (PIECES_APPROVED ='' OR PIECES_APPROVED IS NULL)
AND PIECES_APPROVED !=''

AND (FOLWER_FACTORY ='' OR FOLWER_FACTORY IS NULL)
AND FOLWER_FACTORY !=''

AND PROOFING_TIME !=''

AND LARGE_CARGO_COMPLETION_TIME !=''

AND (ACCESSORIES_PURCHASING_TIME ='' OR ACCESSORIES_PURCHASING_TIME IS NULL)

AND CROP_COMPLETION_TIME !=''

AND PLATEMAKING_TIME !=''
ORDER BY urgent_state DESC,ADD_TIME DESC LIMIT #{pageNow},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into build_progress
ID,
DESIGNERS,
REFERENCE_WAVE,
REFERENCE_PRINTING,
CRAFTS_ORDER,
PATTERN_CRAFTS_ORDER,
SIZE_CHART,
ORINGINAL_WAVE,
WAVE,

ORDERS,
ORDER_DETAILS,
COLOUR,
RELEASE_TIME,
PIECES_APPROVED,
FOLWER_FACTORY,
PROOFING_TIME,
PROOFING_COMPLETION_TIME,
LARGE_CARGO_TIME,
LARGE_CARGO_COMPLETION_TIME,
CUT_LARGE_RECEIVE_TIME,
CUT_LARGE_RETURN_TIME,
QUOT,
PRINTING_PRICE,
PIECES_PRICE,
FLOWER_PRICE,
ACCESSORIES_PURCHASING_TIME,
FABRIC_STORAGE_TIME,
FABRIC_RELEASE_TIME,
CUTTING_TIME,
CROP_COMPLETION_TIME,
CROP_NUMBER,
FACTORY_PICKING_TIME,
FACTORY,
ORDER_TYPE,
ORDER_PRICE,
PLANNED_SHIPPING_TIME,
STORAGE_TIME,
STORAGE_NUMBER,
REMARKS,
STATE,
ADD_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
DEL_TIME,
urgent_state,
patternCompletionTime,
PLATEMAKING_TIME,
PLAN_FACTORY_PICKING_TIME,

mapper.update:
update build_progress
DESIGNERS = #{designers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFERENCE_WAVE = #{referenceWave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFERENCE_PRINTING = #{referencePrinting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFTS_ORDER = #{craftsOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATTERN_CRAFTS_ORDER = #{patternCraftsOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIZE_CHART = #{sizeChart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORINGINAL_WAVE = #{oringinalWave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAVE = #{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMAGE = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERS = #{orders,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DETAILS = #{orderDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLOUR = #{colour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELEASE_TIME = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIECES_APPROVED = #{piecesApproved,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOLWER_FACTORY = #{folwerFactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROOFING_TIME = #{proofingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROOFING_COMPLETION_TIME = #{proofingCompletionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LARGE_CARGO_TIME = #{largeCargoTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LARGE_CARGO_COMPLETION_TIME = #{largeCargoCompletionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUT_LARGE_RECEIVE_TIME = #{cutLargeReceiveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUT_LARGE_RETURN_TIME = #{cutLargeReturnTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUOT = #{quot,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRINTING_PRICE = #{printingPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PIECES_PRICE = #{piecesPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLOWER_PRICE = #{flowerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACCESSORIES_PURCHASING_TIME = #{accessoriesPurchasingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FABRIC_STORAGE_TIME = #{fabricStorageTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FABRIC_RELEASE_TIME = #{fabricReleaseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUTTING_TIME = #{cuttingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CROP_COMPLETION_TIME = #{cropCompletionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CROP_NUMBER = #{cropNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTORY_PICKING_TIME = #{factoryPickingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTORY = #{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_PRICE = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLANNED_SHIPPING_TIME = #{plannedShippingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORAGE_TIME = #{storageTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORAGE_NUMBER = #{storageNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_TIME = #{delTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urgent_state = #{urgentState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
patternCompletionTime = #{patternCompletionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATEMAKING_TIME=#{plateMakingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
PLAN_FACTORY_PICKING_TIME=#{planFactoryPickingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where WAVE = #{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
